comment: /**  * Returns the array of indices that the action relates to  */
code: /**  * Returns the array of indices that the action relates to  */ String[] indices().

comment: /**  * Returns the indices options used to resolve indices. They tell for instance whether a single index is  * accepted, whether an empty array will be converted to _all, and how wildcards will be expanded if needed.  */
code: /**  * Returns the indices options used to resolve indices. They tell for instance whether a single index is  * accepted, whether an empty array will be converted to _all, and how wildcards will be expanded if needed.  */ IndicesOptions indicesOptions().

comment: /**  * Sets the indices that the action relates to.  */
code: /**  * Sets the indices that the action relates to.  */ IndicesRequest indices(String... indices).
